message: Is there a way to change currency in amazon from USD to EGP?

data.message: Yes, when you're paying at checkout you get to choose to pay in EGP. I did that about a week or so ago.
paypal offers conversion on the fly!
It doesn't charge u in EGP, does it?
It will still count from your card's USD limit. :P

Careful .. using the currency converter on Amazon still charges your card in USD, it's just an estimation 
After my bank (long time ago before the whole dollar thing) charged me more than it was stated, Amazon's customer support confirmed that it's just an estimation and they charge you in USD

"When you purchase using Amazon Currency Converter:
- We’ll automatically display your order total in your local currency on the order summary page.
- You'll always have the option to pay either in your local currency or in US Dollars.
- The applicable exchange rate will be displayed below your order total at the time of purchase.
- The same foreign exchange rate applied to your purchase will be applied in the event of a return, so you get back what you paid – even if the exchange rate has changed."

Source: https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201895380

And on Amazon.com: https://www.amazon.com/Currency-Converter/b?ie=UTF8&node=388305011

It's not just an estimate.
Even if you paid in EGP,  the limits applies to all  international transactions.
بص في حاجة سهلة لو عايز تدفع بالمصري هتروح تعمل reload amazon balance دا هتلاقي لوحده في اختيار انك تدفع بالمصري و منه بتشتري اللي انت عايزه بس لو بتعمل كدا علشان ليميت الفيزا فا للاسف هي هي
Do u know how can I change all the money I own from EGP to USD?
